name: constipation_symptom
title: Parkinson Constipation Symptom Assessment
description: Assessment of Parkinson Constipation (existence and numeric evaluation); e.g. scoring with NMS questionnaire

feature.name: periodStart
feature.title: Assessment date or start date of assessment period
feature.description: Assessment date (if periodEnd is not given) or start date of assessment period

feature.name: method
feature.title: Assessment method
feature.description: Code for the assessment method used e.g. nms: Non-Motor Rating Scale(NMS),

feature.name: isSymptomSeen
feature.title: Is constipation seen
feature.description: Whether constipation is seen during the given period

feature.name: symptomScore
feature.title: Constipation assessment score
feature.description: Constipation assessment score (e.g. calculated from NMS, Part J.4, Range: 0-16)
